quote: Oh, he was a decent-enough high school student, good grades and well-liked, but his test scores were nothing to write home about. He might as well have Christmas-treed the math test.
quote_letters: OH HE WAS A DECENT-ENOUGH HIGH SCHOOL STUDENT GOOD GRADES AND WELL-LIKED BUT HIS TEST SCORES WERE NOTHING TO WRITE HOME ABOUT HE MIGHT AS WELL HAVE CHRISTMAS-TREED THE MATH TEST
